org_name: SAN FRANCISCO HUMAN SERVICES AGENCY SAN FRANCISCO RENTAL ASSISTANCE PROGRAM
description: Provide back rent or security deposit to low income San Francisco residents meeting criteria.  www.sfhsa.org

keys: Referrals to other services as needed.
and other supporting documentation, as needed.
Low-income (80% AMI or below) families with minor children in their custody

usage_requirements_expression: $income <= 80% AMI and ((has('minor children') and has('children in custody')) or has('verified disablity') or $age >= 55Y or ( is_in_class('emancipated_youth') and $age < 18Y and is_in_class('in_foster_system'))  or (is_in_class('US_veteran')) or 'is_in_class('victim of recent violence') ) and should_have('State_issued_id') and should_have('social security card') and should_have ('birth certificate') and should_have ('proof_of_income')  and should_have('lease agreement')

org_name: TENDERLOIN HOUSING CLINIC NEW ROADS PROGRAM
description: In partnership with San Francisco Adult Probation, the New Roads Program provides services to clients who are on Adult Probation in San Franisco. The New Roads Program is a rental subsidy program designed for clients who are homeless or unstably housed, and are seeking housing and financial stability. Services for clients accepted into the program include: housing search assistance, rental subsidies, financial assistance, and supportive setvices. The goal for all New Roads clients is to obtain permanent housing and increase monthly income during program participation, in order to become self-sufficient. www.thclinic.org
notes:
Clients may phone or drop in to inquire about services, but will need an appointment for an intake. Clients must be on supervised Adult Probation in San Francisco and must be referred by their Deputy Probation Officer. 

 Clients must be referred to the program by the San Francisco Adult Probation Department, must be currently homeless or unstably housed, and have at least 12 months remaining on supervision.

keys: Referal from the San Francisco Adult Probation Department

usage_requirements_expression: referal_from('San Francisco Adult Probation Department') and (is_of_class('homeless') or is_of_class('unstabaly housed') ) and ( member_of_class('parolee') and time_until($end_of_parole) > 1Y )
